headline: PayPal Wants to Turn Small Retailers Into Amazon Ads. The Stock Is Rising.
summary: Shares of  PayPal Holdings  jumped on Tuesday after the digital payments company unveiled an advertising-management platform for small businesses.  PayPal Ads Manager will allow companies that use PayPal to create their own retail media networks, or RMNs, industry-speak for merchant-owned ad spaces.  “We’re enabling small businesses to participate in the same high-margin advertising model that’s powering growth at some of the largest companies in the world,” said Mark Grether, the general manager of PayPal Ads.

raw.headline: PayPal Wants to Turn Small Retailers Into Amazon Ads. The Stock Is Rising.
raw.summary: Shares of  PayPal Holdings  jumped on Tuesday after the digital payments company unveiled an advertising-management platform for small businesses.  PayPal Ads Manager will allow companies that use PayPal to create their own retail media networks, or RMNs, industry-speak for merchant-owned ad spaces.  “We’re enabling small businesses to participate in the same high-margin advertising model that’s powering growth at some of the largest companies in the world,” said Mark Grether, the general manager of PayPal Ads.

headline: Chomps Takes a Bite Out of Barriers to Growth with NetSuite
summary: SuiteWorld -- Chomps, a leading snack brand known for its high-quality meat sticks, is using Oracle NetSuite to support its mission of delivering convenient and accessible snacks made with real ingredients. With NetSuite's unified business management suite, Chomps has been able to increase the speed and accuracy of financial processes, maximize visibility across its business, and establish a scalable foundation to support its continued growth.

raw.headline: Chomps Takes a Bite Out of Barriers to Growth with NetSuite

headline: Instacart Announces First End-to-End Retail Media Solution on TikTok
summary: Instacart (Nasdaq: CART) announced a new integration with TikTok that enables select CPG advertisers to tap into its first-party retail media data to enhance campaign targeting, drive seamless product purchases, and measure performance—all within TikTok Ads Manager.

raw.headline: Instacart Announces First End-to-End Retail Media Solution on TikTok

headline: BERO Brews International Growth with NetSuite
summary: SuiteWorld -- BERO, the premium non-alcoholic beer brand, is using Oracle NetSuite to support its mission to create beverages for those who seek a more balanced lifestyle, without sacrificing taste, quality, and enjoyment. With NetSuite's AI-powered business management suite, BERO has been able to maximize productivity, increase the speed and accuracy of financial reporting, and create a scalable foundation for growth by automating key business processes.

headline: Clean Simple Eats Selects January Digital as Media AOR to Amplify Record Growth
summary: NEW YORK, October 07, 2025--Clean Simple Eats, the health and wellness brand behind Target’s No. 1 best-selling protein powder, has appointed January Digital as its media AOR. The agency is responsible for strategy, planning, and execution across Google and Meta, with a focus on customer acquisition and scalable growth for the undeniably clean supplements.

headline: Truist Slashes PT on Target Corporation (TGT) to $83 From $102, Keeps a Hold Rating
summary: Target Corporation (NYSE:TGT) is one of the most undervalued retail stocks to invest in. On October 2, Truist lowered the firm’s price target on Target Corporation (NYSE:TGT) to $83 from $102 while keeping a Hold rating on the shares.
